title: Why is keen in doom 2?
content:
I think I know why.

Mortimer opened a gateway to hell by destabilizing the inter-dimensional gateway the
UAC had built, when keen got there Mortimer told him the final plan to destroy the universe and was pulled into the gateway never to be seen again.
Keen ran back to his bean-with-bacon mega rocket to leave phobos and warn earth but the imps and zombies ripped it to pieces.
Keen uses his neural stunner to stop them until he runs into doomguy.
He hands him a shotgun and asks keen to help.

PHOBOS ANOMALY

Keen and doomguy continue to kill hell minions until they get to the teleporter that leads to deimos and enter it not knowing what will happen.
It was a trap, they both get ambushed and are killed.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img]

THE SHORES OF HELL

When keen and doomguy get to the tower of babel they find out Mortimer has been transformed into a cyber demon.
The cyber demon Mortimer tells them the spider masterminds plan to bring hell to earth.
Together they destroy Mortimer and find out that deimos is floating above hell

INFERNO

After climbing down into hell they confront the spider mastermind and kill it.
Keen and doomguy kicked its ass for all time!
A hidden doorway opens, keen and doomguy enter.
Commander keen and doom guy proven too tough for hell to contain.
Keen and doomguy get separated, doomguy exits the doorway and wonders where keen
was sent to but that was the least of his worries, hell had followed him.
Keen was sent to grosse, where the nazis and mortimer the newly resurrected cyber demon would get there revenge.

HELL ON EARTH

Doomguy continues to lay waste to the hell minions until he finds keen, messed up and forgotten.
Keen had been tortured, hung and lost four lives.
Doomguy tells keen to get up and hands him a BFG9000.
Keen with the help of doomguy finally puts an end to the nazis and Mortimer the cyber demon.
They continue on to the final place of evil.

ICON OF SIN

Keen helps doomguy by giving him backup and doomguy sends the final rocket into the exposed brain of the demon.
The horrendous visage of the big demon crumbles before them, the monster shrivels up and dies, its thrashing limbs devastating untold miles of hell's surface.
They've done it.
The invasion is over.
Earth is saved.

And.....thats what I think really happened.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

[img]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/9499/keendoomsk1.png[/img]

Where did the vorticons go?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

title: Re: Why is keen in doom 2?
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stunned.gif[/img]

Well, personally I believe there's no hell in the Keeniverse..3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Why is keen in doom 2?
Re: Why is keen in doom 2?
content:
Future......time travel......yeah......

Ok.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

During the battle for the universe, (that never happens) commander keen and mortimer are sent to the future somehow, thanks to the research on inter-dimensional space travel the UAC was doing.
There they arrive through the gateway.
The UAC scientists had no idea what was going on, keen and mortimer continue fighting until mortimer escapes.
Keen uses technology from the future to invent new things and becomes.....

[img]http://img165.imageshack.us/img165/4879/futurekeennq1.png[/img]
Commander keen of the future![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

Now keen looks more like he belongs in doom.

title: Keen in Doom2
content:
I believe Keen's presence in Doom2 is sadly symbolic of id Software's relationship with him at that point in their career. Keen was their start-up game; their killer app to get them marketshare... and Doom was their breakaway success. By the time Doom2 was out and about, they were working on making Quake the best game they could, and with that paradigm shift, Keen's 2d gameplay would go backburner long-term.

First it was Platform Games, then Fighting Games, and now it's FPS Games. MMORPGs seem to be vying for the next 'big' thing, but we'll see what the future holds. <!--EZCODE IMAGE START---<img src="http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png"/><!--EZCODE IMAGE END---

title: Re: Keen in Doom2
content:
Yeah, Xky's right -- there's no story for it, especially nothing related to the original game series. But as LL said, Keen can come back -- in about 30 years, just as space invanders.
